member.name: IRelatedItem.GetItem
member.summary: Gets the that is related to this item.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the address of a pointer to the interface for the item that is related to this item.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRelatedItem.GetItemIDList
member.summary: Gets the pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) for the item that is related.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the PIDL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IRelatedItem
